Want a OK game to play that’s horror. Then this is a game you can play although there’s game breaking bugs out there and the devs focus on little things such as breaking cosmetic sets. Well besides that they got many horror characters you love such as the Texas chainsaw massacre,scream,nightmare on elm street, and the new addition of the ring. If you have a console just switch to pc it allows you to use controller on pc and it also gives you the benefit of trying coming chapters and possibly playing with popular people during that time. I’ve faced people such as otz jrm tithi and ayrun. It’s one of the best horror games we got rn so come try it. I’m sure you’ll enjoy it

キラー側はバリエーションが無くて飽きやすく
サバイバー側は簡単な為スリルが無い（ホラーゲームとは…）

正直お勧めは出来ない。


< 2021/02/23 追記 >
何故行ったのかよくわからないアプデにより、やりづらさ＆ストレス増加。
それに伴いサバイバーとキラー共に勝敗に影響を及ぼす程のバグが複数発生。
更に以前よりも間違いなくチーターが増えた為、PC版でのプレイが更にお勧め出来なくなった。
どうしてもこのゲームをプレイしたいのであれば、PCと比べてチーターが遥かに少ないPSなどのCS版でクロスプレイオフでプレイすることをお勧めします。
ただ、キラーは間違いなくPC版の方がやりやすい為、あくまでサバイバーをやりたい方向けです。(現環境ではキラーはかなり遊びの幅が狭くフラストレーションが溜まりやすいので）


総評として

サバイバーをやりたいのであればクロスプレイオフでCS版(人口減少により、待ち時間10~20分はザラですが…チーターに出会うよりはマシです)

キラーをやりたいのであればPC版(待ち時間はサバイバーと比べると早いものの、上記の通り遊びの幅が狭いです。全滅狙いとなると選べるキラーもかなり限られます。また現在PC版はチーターが急増している為、試合が無駄の終わり理不尽にランクが下がる事もあります。)

これらを理解した上で購入することをお勧めします。

100 horas de jogo e posso garantir que o jogo é extremamente divertido, jogando sozinho ou com um grupo de amigos, jogar de sobrevivente é tão legal quanto de killer, momentos únicos e uma comunidade bem estruturada. Eu sou do tipo de pessoa que gosta de aprender sobre o jogo, então acompanho streamers e youtubers de nome e mais novos. Se está na dúvida entre comprar ou não assista vídeos e live streams para se motivar mais ainda e seja muito bem vindo a comunidade de dbd. A empresa por sua vez, demora a corrigir alguns bugs, mas você vai mais rir com a comunidade zoando eles do que se estressar, afinal o sistema de jogo não é tão competitivo, claro tem níveis a subir mas você vai subir com o tempo dedicado em Dead by Daylight. Se encante com a comunidade, tenha perseguições implacáveis como sobrevivente, aplique um HIT COLOSSAL de killer e se lembre: A Morte Não é o Final.

I hate this game.

Honestly, this game has a lot of issues, I play mostly survivor so let me tell you this, the game requires you to have an exhaustion perk or you'll be at a huge disadvantage, it also requires you or two other teammates to have borrowed time for safe rescues since killers at lower ranks like to patrol and even camp hooks. I've had no issues with this but cheaters are pretty rampant on the game from what I've heard. This game due to it's perk system, requires perks like borrowed time, dead hard (or any other exhaustion but this is the most common), Decisive strike, and to a degree unbreakable in order to live as long as possible as survivor in a lot of situations. This game has recently added boon totems, which are the survivors version of hexes BUT survivors need to bless a totem of their choice and they can do it as many times as they like. 

TLDR; Game can be fun

Разрабам нужно еще много поработать, чтобы довести игру до ума. 
Пинг, разрывы сети, бан, когда ты не виноват, пробития, баги, инбалансные маны. Все это можно починить. 
Разрывы, ивенты - хорошее решение, пока разрабы более менее на верном пути. 
Один вопрос, на который нет ответа.. Что за любовь к Палачу, почему настолько лучше, чем другие маны? Я понимаю, что механика разная, но у него по сути 3 способки, когда, например, Трапер или Аня без ловушек и топоров слабенькие ходячие, которые будут только бегать и махать своей палкой.
И почините уже в мейне на Ормонде.
14.02.2021

Dead by Daylight (DBD) is amazing for co-op with your friends.
Pros: Lots of characters to play (each having unique perks that are available to everyone at certain levels in the game), awesome maps both indoor and outdoor, tons of costumes that each character can have, not a pay to win game
Cons: Wait time for games van take 10 seconds or 10 minutes depending on the time of day.

Play Dead By Daylight they said... It wont take over your life they said... It has great content and no bugs at all... they said... If your looking for a game that can be a masochist for you. This is the one. God its such a good game, but puts me through so much pain to play it. At the end of every DBD session u have to get 10 hours of therapy to play it again right after. Community is Toxic ofc, but finding the fun chill people make this game worth while.

Absolutely love this game and I'm someone who struggles to keep interest with games.  When starting out, be patient, there is a small learning curve.  I recommend playing both survivor and killer.  I started out as killer thinking survivor would not be fun and I ended up liking survivor more.  Additionally, playing survivor made me a much better killer.
So much fun, playing alone or with friends. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes strategy mixed with a little bloodshed.
